item.title: Kristin add a quote by Christoper Marlowe
Kristin add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Helen Hayes
item.description: "We rely upon the poets, the philosophers, and the playwrights to articulate what most of us can only feel, in joy or sorrow. They illuminate the thoughts for which we only grope; they give us the strength and balm we cannot find in ourselves. Whenever I feel my courage wavering, I rush to them. They give me the wisdom of acceptance, the will and resiliance to push on." -- Helen Hayes

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Booker T. Washington
item.description: "If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else." -- Booker T. Washington

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err. It passes my comprehension how human beings, be they ever so experienced and able, can delight in depriving other human beings of that precious right." -- Mahatma Gandhi
